Silver

Silver

Name: Silver

Formula: Ag

Atomic Number: 47

Group: 11

Block: d

Period: 5

Relative Atomic Mass: 107.868

Discovery Date: 3000BC

Appearance: Relatively soft, shiny metal.

Uses: Jewellery, silver tableware, mirrors, dental alloys,solder, batteries, antibacterial uses.

Atomic Structure:
